name: Lucky 鱼🤞🐟
description:
DEMO COMING SOON

FEATURES

  • Beautiful hand-painted Chinese traditional black ink art
  • Relaxing and meditative soundscape.
  • Simple to understand mechanics.
  • Chill enough you can talk and play, like a fidget spinner for the senses.
  • Fish, with more planned soon.
